Name: AftLife -Girl and Cats, and Lost world-
About the game: Consept A girl and cats make 'Heartful Comedy & Mystery' Comedy depicting calm everyday! The big mystery is solved in story. New Stories from Update Story is composed of short stories that are completed. Please wait for update! Story There is room in small house. A girl's name is Arisa, she is muttering. '……I'm hungry' A cat's name is Tis, she is amazed. 'Duh, you just had breakfast?' A girl is laugh in easy everyday, and cry for small things. Then she reads a book about the outside world, and grows into an adult step by step. ――This is a story about take one step from the lost world. Character ■Arisa A girl is laid back person. She has never left home, and be curious about the knowledge she do not know. Trusting Tis and be spoiled. ■Tis Talking cat is caring. She does all housework, just a cat's hand. she's amazed and laugh for Arisa's behavior.
